title: 多mod成就怎么用指令完成全部成就
author: 醉枫染墨丶

replies.author: AntiChear/343
replies.txt_content:
提示you must specify which player you wish to perform this action on表示你没有指定设置玩家
/achievement give * 玩家ID 应该为正确指令 注意不要输错玩家名

replies.author: aqwyh
replies.txt_content: /achievement give *就能瞬间获得所有的成就

replies.author: 醉枫染墨丶
replies.txt_content:
aqwyh 发表于 2018-2-22 12:43
/achievement give *就能瞬间获得所有的成就
他提示you must specify which player you wish to perform this action on 怎么办。

replies.author: fankieqiu
replies.txt_content: /achievement give 玩家名 * 这样试试

replies.author: fankieqiu
replies.txt_content:
fankieqiu 发表于 2018-2-22 16:07
/achievement give 玩家名 * 这样试试
或者/achievement give  *  玩家名

replies.author: 醉枫染墨丶
replies.txt_content:
AJ_ 发表于 2018-2-22 17:11
试试
/achievement give *
不行，他提示you must specify which player you wish to perform this action on

replies.txt_content:
fankieqiu 发表于 2018-2-22 16:08
或者/achievement give  *  玩家名
他会提示you must specify which player you wish to perform this action on

replies.author: fankieqiu
replies.txt_content:
醉枫染墨丶 发表于 2018-2-22 18:25
他会提示you must specify which player you wish to perform this action on
/achievement give 玩家名 * 这样呢?

提示you must specify which player you wish to perform this action on表示你没有指定设置玩家
/achievement give * 玩家ID 应该为正确指令 注意不要输错玩家名
